timeline.bodyText:
选择语言 should always be in English. Both in zh-CN and en version.
For foreigner, they don't know and 选择语言 is Language. so that he can not found how to change language.
timeline.author: morningman

timeline.message:
Language selecting label

Set the  text of the Language selecting label to English
